description:
The Databricks command-line interface (also known as the **Databricks CLI**) provides a tool to automate the Databricks platform from your terminal, command prompt, or automation scripts.

## Installation Details

This package installs a version of the Databricks CLI that is currently in [Public Preview](https://docs.databricks.com/en/release-notes/release-types.html).

Running the following command will return version `0.215.0` if the installation was successful:

```
databricks -v
```

## Documentation

- [Tutorial](https://docs.databricks.com/en/dev-tools/cli/tutorial.html)
- [Basic Usage](https://docs.databricks.com/en/dev-tools/cli/usage.html)
- [Commands](https://docs.databricks.com/en/dev-tools/cli/commands.html)
summary: The Databricks CLI provides a tool to automate the Databricks platform from your terminal, command prompt, or automation scripts.
